BOX PLOT

library("ggplot2")
library("tidyverse")

ggplot(eSportsData, aes(x=Number.of.Players..Millions., y=Game)) + 
  geom_boxplot(notch = TRUE, color = "blue", fill = "white", alpha = 0.2) + 
  labs(title="Number of Players of Selected eSports Games Worldwide as of August 2017",
       y ="Game", x = "Number of Players (Millions)")

HISTOGRAM

library("ggplot2")
library("tidyverse")

ggplot(eSportsData, aes(x = Number.of.Players..Millions.), stat = "bin") + 
  geom_histogram(binwidth = 6.5, color="blue", fill="white") +
  geom_density(alpha=1, fill="#FF6666") + 
  labs(title="Counts of Number of Players of Selected eSports Games Worldwide as of August 2017",
       x ="Number of Players(Millions)", y = "Count")
       
VIOLIN PLOT

library("ggplot2")
library("tidyverse")


ggplot(data = eSportsData, aes(y = Game, x = Number.of.Players..Millions.)) + 
  geom_violin(color = "blue", fill = "white") + 
  labs(title="Number of Players of Selected eSports Games Worldwide as of August 2017",
       y ="Game", x = "Number of Players (Millions)")
